information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/jeff-hykin/cpp-textmate-grammar/blob/master//syntaxes/cpp.tmLanguage.json
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: C++

patterns.name: meta.function.destructor.cpp
patterns.begin:
(?x)
(?:
  ^ |                  # beginning of line
  (?:(?<!else|new|=))  # or word + space before name
)
((?:[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*::)*+~[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*) # actual name
\s*(\()              # opening bracket

patterns.name: meta.function.destructor.prototype.cpp
patterns.begin:
(?x)
(?:
  ^ |                  # beginning of line
  (?:(?<!else|new|=))  # or word + space before name
)
((?:[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*::)*+~[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*) # actual name
\s*(\()              # opening bracket

patterns.name: meta.preprocessor.macro.cpp
patterns.begin:
(?x)
^\s* ((\#)\s*define) \s+	# define
((?<id>(?-mix:[a-zA-Z_$][\w$]*)))	  # macro name
(?:
  (\()
	(
	  \s* \g<id> \s*		 # first argument
	  ((,) \s* \g<id> \s*)*  # additional arguments
	  (?:\.\.\.)?			# varargs ellipsis?
	)
  (\))
)?

(?x)
(?:^\s*)  # beginning of line
((?!while|for|do|if|else|switch|catch)[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_:]*) # actual name
\s*(\()  # opening bracket
patterns.name: meta.function.constructor.cpp
meta.initialization.cpp
patterns.begin:
(?x)
(?:
  (?:
	(?=\s)(?<!else|new|return)
	(?<=\w) \s+(and|and_eq|bitand|bitor|compl|not|not_eq|or|or_eq|typeid|xor|xor_eq|alignof|alignas)  # or word + space before name
  )
)
(
  (?:[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z0-9_]*+ | :: )++   # actual name
  |
  (?:(?<=operator) (?:[-*&<>=+!]+ | \(\) | \[\]))
)
\s*(\() # opening bracket

patterns.match:
(?x) %
(\d+\$)?						   # field (argument #)
[#0\- +']*						  # flags
[,;:_]?							  # separator character (AltiVec)
((-?\d+)|\*(-?\d+\$)?)?		  # minimum field width
(\.((-?\d+)|\*(-?\d+\$)?)?)?	# precision
(hh|h|ll|l|j|t|z|q|L|vh|vl|v|hv|hl)? # length modifier
[diouxXDOUeEfFgGaACcSspn%]		   # conversion type
patterns.name: constant.other.placeholder.cpp
